comments.author: Kamil
comments.content: Ah, you know how weird it must be for me and Matthieu to go back to Atsugi. Somehow after the trip last time back to Japan, I didn't want to go back anymore because I know its not the same anymore!!! Having said that...I want Veloche's royal milk tea :P

comments.author: Mathieu
comments.content:
"Who could possibly forget this street?" => Natsukashii!

Randy, congratulations for completing your trip. Not everyone would have the courage to do it so you can be proud of you!
